import React, { Component } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import ImageEditable from '../../droy/ImageEditable' const timelineContainer = { fontFamily: "'Caladea', serif", display: 'flex', position: 'relative', padding: '50px', backgroundColor: 'white' } const textTimelineContainer = { display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'center', textAlign: 'center', alignItems: 'center', color: '#2a2c2a', width: '100%' } const imageContainer = { width: '80px' } const titleSection1 = { fontWeight: '400', maxWidth: '100%', overflow: 'hidden' } class ClassicTimeline extends Component { render () { const { userStyle, info, changeImage, contentStyle, children: optionsBar, openChangeModal } = this.props return (
{optionsBar}

{info.text9.text}

{info.text10.text}

{info.text11.text}

{info.text12.text}

) } } ClassicTimeline.propTypes = { info: PropTypes.object, changeInfo: PropTypes.func, optionsBar: PropTypes.object, // children: PropTypes.object, code: PropTypes.string } export default ClassicTimeline
